name: clanging-scales
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Lowers the user’s Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user’s Defense stat goes down after the attack.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user rubs the scales on its entire body and makes a huge noise to attack opposing Pokémon. The user's Defense stat goes down after the attack.
